jobDescription: Cloud Sales Engineer/Solutions Manager IIILocation: Santa Clara or Bellevue, Washington    Are you an experienced Cloud Solutions Manager? Our Emerging Business Customer Unit is working with some of the world’s leading technology companies, and we need your Cloud/SDN/NFV expertise to help them continue their infrastructure transformation.     The Opportunity: You will position Ericsson as cloud technology leader, communicate and discuss Ericsson’s emerging business technology strategy with senior level decision makers at our customersDefine and drive prototyping entry criteria and idea generationYou will work closely with the Global prototyping lead to identify customer MVPs with maximum business value to the Global Customer UnitYou will get to explore emerging technologies and create the Next Big Thing    You have: Relentless focus on meeting the customer’s needs10 years of overall experience in the telecommunications and IT industry.3+ years of experience in a sales engineering role.Expertise in Hardware / Software Defined Infrastructure, Data Storage, Data / Application Platform, Security, Data Center FacilitiesThorough knowledge of cloud economics: TCO and commercial models, cost structure and value drivers; make‑buy analysisDeep understanding of cloud technology stack e.g. Microsoft Azure, AWS or Google cloudBachelor’s Degree or equivalent    You might also have: Experience with IoT deployments such as AWS Lamda functionsA maker mentality   Why join the Emerging Business team? The Emerging Business Unit is uniquely positioned to transform the way that Ericsson does business by engaging with non-traditional customers in new and innovative ways. By identifying new market trends in combination with Ericsson capabilities, this team is changing the way the world’s largest companies operate and evolve. We put the customer at the heart of everything we do, to understand their challenges and opportunities and become a trusted partner. We move their business into the fully digital and connected 21st century. This team works with our customers to imagine how a hyper-connected world will transform their business. The EBU helps realize that vision, leveraging existing Ericsson portfolios but also by co-creating and co-investing new solutions. The team spans the three horizons of innovation and creates new ventures from scratch.  We welcome the opportunity to meet you!
